name: Axe Beak
description:
Opportunistic Striker. If this monster moves at least 20 feet before attacking, it deals an extra 1d6 slashing damage and has advantage against creatures that have already been damaged this turn.

Actions

Savage Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

name: Blink Dog
description:
Actions

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 1 piercing damage.

Blink Strike (1/S). This monster magically teleports up to 40 feet and may immediately make a Bite attack before or after teleporting.

name: Cockatrice
description:
Actions

Petrifying Peck. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d4 + 1 piercing damage. The target must make a DC 11 CON saving throw or become restrained for 1 turn. If they fail again at the end of their next turn, they are petrified for 1 additional turn.

name: Cultist
description:
Dark Devotion. This monster has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Actions

Zealot's Blade. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d6 + 1 slashing damage.

name: Flame Skull
description:
Illumination. This monster sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

Magic Resistance. This monster has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Actions

Fire Ray. Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 fire damage.

name: Gas Spore
description:
Explosive Demise. When this monster is destroyed, all creatures within 10 feet must make a DC 12 CON saving throw or take 3d6 poison damage and be poisoned until the end of their next turn. On a success, they take half damage.

Deceptive Appearance. This monster looks like a Beholder at first glance. When an enemy targets it for the first time, they must make a DC 11 INT saving throw or waste their action attacking it, believing it to be a greater threat.

Actions

Spore Burst. Melee Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 poison damage.

name: Ghoul
description:
Unholy Hunger. This monster has advantage on attack rolls against creatures missing HP.

Actions

Paralyzing Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 2 slashing damage. The target must make a DC 11 CON saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

name: Giant Bat
description:
Echolocation. This monster can not be surprised and has advantage on Perception checks relying on hearing.

Flyby. This monster does not provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Actions

Bloodletting Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage. If this attack reduces an enemy to half HP or lower, they start bleeding, taking 1d4 extra damage at the start of their next turn.

name: Gnoll
description:
Rampage. If this monster reduces an enemy to 0 HP, it may immediately move 10 feet and make a Ravenous Claw attack against another enemy.

Actions

Ravenous Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 slashing damage.

Hunting Spear. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 piercing damage.

name: Goblin
description:
Pack Tactics. This monster has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the monster's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Actions

Cutthroat Slash. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 slashing damage.

Ranger Shot. Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage.

name: Mud Mephit
description:
Death Burst. When this monster dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 11 DEX saving throw or be restrained until the end of the creature's next turn.

Actions

Muddy Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 1 slashing damage.

Mud Breath (1/S). This monster spits sticky mud at a target within 15 feet. The target must make a DC 11 DEX saving throw or have its movement speed halved until the end of its next turn.

name: Pixie
description:
Innate Magic. When this monster is summoned, choose one:
  • This monster casts Minor Invisibility on itself and cannot be targeted until it attacks or uses an ability.
  • A target within 30 feet must make a DC 11 WIS saving throw or be charmed until the start of your next turn.
Actions

Pixie Dust. Ranged Magic Attack: +4 to hit, range 15 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 force damage, and the target must make a DC 11 CON saving throw or be dazed and lose reactions until the end of its next turn.

Fey Trickster (1/S). Choose one enemy. It must make a DC 12 INT saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll.

name: Rust Monster
description:
Corroding Touch. When this monster hits a target, if the target is wearing metal armor or wielding a metal weapon, it must make a DC 12 CON saving throw or have its AC reduced by 1 or its weapon deal -1 damage. This effect is cumulative.

Iron Hunger. If this monster applies a -3 penalty to an item through Corroding Touch, it gains +2 AC until the start of its next turn.

Actions

Antennae Swipe. Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 bludgeoning damage.

name: Shadow
description:
Shadow Stealth. While in dim light or darkness, this monster can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Sunlight Weakness. While in sunlight, this monster has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

Actions

Strength Drain. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2d6 + 2 necrotic damage, and the target's STR score is reduced by 1d4 for 2 turns.

name: Skeleton
description:
Hollow Resilience. This monster takes half damage from piercing attacks but double damage from bludgeoning attacks.

Actions

Rusty Shortsword. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage.

Fragile Shortbow. Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage.

name: Smoke Mephit
description:
Death Burst. When this monster dies, it leaves behind a cloud of smoke that fills a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

Actions

Ashen Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 1 slashing damage.

Cinder Breath (1/S). This monster exhales a 15-foot cone of smoldering ash. Creatures in the area must make a DC 11 DEX saving throw or take 1d6 fire damage and have disadvantage on their next attack roll.

name: Swarm of Insects
description:
Swarm Tactics. This monster can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. This monster can't regain HP or gain temporary HP. If this monster has half HP or less, its attacks deal half damage.

Actions

Biting Horde. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 4d6 piercing damage.

name: Tridrone
description:
Multi-tasking Strike. This monster can attack up to three different targets per turn but cannot attack the same target more than once.

Modron Coordination. This monster gains +1 AC for every ally Tridrone on the field.

Actions

Spear Assault. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage.

name: Wolf
description:
Pack Tactics. This monster has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the monster's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Actions

Rending Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 2 piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 STR saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Zombie
description:
Undead Fortitude. If damage reduces this monster to 0 hit points, it must make a CON saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, this monster drops to 1 hit point instead.

Actions

Rotting Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 1 bludgeoning damage. If the target is paralyzed, this attack deals an extra 1d6 necrotic damage.

name: Animated Armor
description:
Living Armor. This monster has resistance to non-magical attacks and advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Sentinel Defense. When an enemy moves within 5 feet of this monster, it must make a DC 13 STR saving throw or have its movement reduced to 0 until the end of the turn.

Actions

Heavy Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.

name: Ankheg
description:
Actions

Bite & Crush. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage. The target must make a DC 12 STR saving throw or be grappled.

Acid Spray (1/S). This monster spits acid in a 15 foot line, provided that it has no creature grappled. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 DEX saving throw, taking 3d6 acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Banshee
description:
Incorporeal Movement. This monster can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 1d10 force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

Actions

Corrupting Touch. Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3d6 necrotic damage.

Wail of the Dead (1/S). All non-Undead creatures within 10 feet must make a DC 14 CON saving throw. On a failure, they take 4d6 necrotic damage and are frightened until the end of their next turn. On a success, they take half as much damage and are not frightened.

name: Blue Dragon Wyrmling
description:
Actions

Bite of the Storm. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 3 piercing damage plus 1d6 lightning damage.

Lightning Breath (1/S). This monster exhales lightning in a 20-foot line. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 DEX saving throw, taking 4d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Bulette
description:
Burrowing Terror. If this monster moves at least 15 feet underground before attacking, its next attack deals an extra 1d8 damage.

Actions

Rending Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 4 piercing damage.

Deadly Leap. This monster leaps up to 20 feet and crashes down in a 10-foot radius. All creatures in the area must make a DC 14 DEX saving throw or take 3d6 bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half the damage and is instead pushed 5 feet out of this monster's space.

name: Cave Bear
description:
Ferocious Charge. If this monster moves at least 10 feet before attacking, its first attack deals an extra 1d8 damage, and the target must make a DC 13 STR saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster makes a Bone-Crushing Bite attack and a Rending Claws attack.

Bone-Crushing Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage.

Rending Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 4 slashing damage. If the target is prone, this attack deals an extra 1d6 damage.

name: Chimera
description:
Actions

Lion's Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 slashing damage. If the target is below half HP, this attack has advantage.

Goat's Horns. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d12 + 4 bludgeoning damage. If the target is prone, this attack deals an extra 1d12 damage.

Dragon's Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage. The target must make a DC 14 CON saving throw or be poisoned.

name: Chuul
description:
Amphibious. This monster can breathe air and water.

Brutal Claws. This monster can attack enemies that it has grappled, and it deals an extra 2d8 damage to those enemies.

Actions

Pincer Crush. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 bludgeoning damage.

Tentacle Snare. This monster attempts to grapple a creature within 10 feet. The target must make a DC 14 STR saving throw or be restrained until the start of its next turn.

name: Cult High Priest
description:
Dark Blessing. Cultist monsters under your control gain +3 to attack rolls.

Actions

Sacrificial Dagger. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

Blood Offering (1/S). Sacrifice one of your monsters. If you sacrificed an R rarity monster, heal 1d10 HP and draw a card. If you sacrificed an SR rarity monster, heal 3d8 HP and draw a card. If you sacrificed an SSR rarity monster, heal 6d6 HP and draw 2 cards.

name: Fire Elemental
description:
Illumination. This monster sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

Water Susceptibility. For every 5 feet this monster moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster makes two Molten Grasp attacks.

Molten Grasp. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 1d10 fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

name: Gelatinous Cube
description:
Ooze Cube. This monster takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw.

Actions

Pseudopod Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 3d6 acid damage.

Engulf. Whenever this monster enters a creature's space, the creature must make a DC 12 DEX saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of this monster. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw. On a failed save, this monster enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 3d6 acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, is restrained, and takes 6d6 acid damage at the start of each of the cube's turns. When this monster moves, the engulfed creature moves with it. An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 12 STR check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of this monster.

name: Giant Eagle
description:
Keen Sight. This monster has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster a Swooping Beak attack and a Razor Talons attack.

Swooping Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage.

Razor Talons. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 slashing damage.

name: Grick
description:
Stone Camouflage. This monster has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster makes a Lashing Tentacles and a Hooked Beak attack.

Lashing Tentacles. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 2 slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must make a DC 12 DEX saving throw or be grappled.

Hooked Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage. If the target is grappled, this attack deals an extra 1d8 damage.

name: Harpy
description:
Actions

Ripping Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 slashing damage.

Luring Song. This monster sings a magical melody. Choose an enemy within 30 feet. It must make a DC 14 WIS saving throw or be charmed by this monster until the end of its next turn. The charmed creature must move toward this monster and cannot take reactions.

name: Lizardfolk Shaman
description:
Tribal Wisdom. When you summon a Beast or Humanoid monster, you may draw a card.

Actions

Mystic Staff. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage.

Primal Guidance (1/S). Choose one of your monsters on the field. Until the start of your next turn, it gains +1 AC and advantage on saving throws against magic.

name: Merrow
description:
Amphibious. This monster can breathe air and water.

Aquatic Hunter. While this monster is in water, it and any allied creatures within 10 feet gain advantage on attack rolls.

Actions

Brtual Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 slashing damage.

Harpoon Drag. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 4 piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a STR contest against this monster or be pulled up to 20 feet toward this monster.

name: Minotaur
description:
Charge. If this monster moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then makes a melee attack, the target must make a DC 14 STR saving throw or be pushed 10 feet back and take an extra 2d6 bludgeoning damage.

Labyrinthine Fury. This monster has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are within 10 feet of a wall or obstacle.

Actions

Gore. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 4 piercing damage.

name: Mummy
description:
Dreadful Presence. Enemy creatures within 10 feet of this monster have disadvantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Actions

Rotting Fist. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3d6 necrotic damage. The target must make a DC 14 CON saving throw or its maximum HP is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken.

Curse of the Pharaoh(1/S). Choose an enemy creature within 30 feet of this monster. It must make a DC 14 WIS saving throw or take 2d6 necrotic damage and be cursed until the end of its next turn. While cursed, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and cannot regain HP.

name: Myconid Sovereign
description:
Spore Leader. Allied Plant monsters gain +1 AC and heal 1d4 HP at the start of this monster's turn.

Actions

Toxic Fist. Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 bludgeoning damage. The target must make a DC 14 CON saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Animating Spores (1/S). Search your discard pile for a Beast or Humanoid monster. Summon it to the field with half of its maximum HP. Return the summoned monster to the discard pile after 2 turns.

name: Owlbear
description:
Keen Sight and Smell. This monster has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight or smell.

Monstrous Frenzy. If this monster is reduced to half HP, it gains advantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster makes a Crushing Beak attack and a Raking Claws attack.

Crushing Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d10 + 5 piercing damage. If this attack reduces an enemy to 0 HP, this monster may move up to 10 feet immediately.

Raking Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 5 slashing damage.

name: Phase Spider
description:
Ethereal Jaunt. As a bonus action, this monster can can shift into the Ethereal Plane, moving through creatures and objects without provoking opportunity attacks.

Spider Climb. This monster can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Walker. This monster ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Actions

Venomous Ambush. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage plus 2d6 poison damage. The target must make a DC 14 CON saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute (can repeat save at the end of each of its turns).

name: Vortex Serpent
description:
Coiled in the Void. This monster can move through obstacles and cannot be grappled or restrained.

Actions

Cosmic Fangs. Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 force damage.

Gravitic Crush (1/S). Choose an enemy. It must make a DC 14 STR saving throw or be pulled 10 feet toward this monster and take 1d6 force damage.

name: Winter Wolf
description:
Pack Tactics. This monster has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the monster's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Snow Camouflage. This monster has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

Actions

Frostbite Fangs. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage plus 1d6 cold damage.

Cold Breath (1/S). Exhales a 15-foot cone of freezing cold. Each creature in the area must make a DC 14 DEX saving throw or take 3d6 cold damage and have their movement speed halved until the end of their next turn.

name: Aboleth
description:
Amphibious. This monster can breathe air and water.

Actions

Tentacle Lash. Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 3d6 + 6 bludgeoning damage.

Enslave. Choose one enemy creature within 30 feet of this monster. It must make a DC 17 WIS save or be Charmed for 1 minute.

Psychic Drain (1/S). Choose one Charmed enemy creature within 60 feet of this monster. The target takes 3d6 psychic damage, and this monster heals HP equal to the damage dealt.

name: Adult Black Dragon
description:
Amphibious. This monster can breathe air and water.

Actions

Multiattack (1/S). This monster makes a Doomfang Bite attack and two Tearing Claws attacks.

Doomfang Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 + 6 piercing damage plus 1d8 acid damage.

Tearing Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 6 slashing damage.

Acid Breath (1/S). This monster exhales acid in a 30-foot line. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18 DEX saving throw, taking 12d8 acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Archmage
description:
Spellcasting. This monster can use its action to cast any spell played from your hand. Use INT spell save DC 20 and +12 to hit with spell attacks for any spells used from this monster.

Preparations. This monster casts Mage Armor, Stoneskin, and Mind Blank on itself when summoned.

Magic Resistance. This monster has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Actions

Arcane Dagger. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage.

name: Iron Golem
description:
Fire Absorption. Whenever this monster is subjected to fire damage, it instead heals HP equal to the damage dealt.

Immutable Form. This monster is immune to all conditions except blinded, deafened, and paralyzed.

Actions

Titanic Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3d10 + 6 bludgeoning damage. The target must make a DC 17 STR saving throw or be knocked prone.

Poison Breath (1/S). Exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 16 CON saving throw or take 5d6 poison damage and become poisoned until the end of its next turn.

name: Lich
description:
Spellcasting. This monster can use its action to cast any spell played from your hand. Use INT spell save DC 17 and +9 to hit with spell attacks for any spells used from this monster.

Turn Resistance. This monster has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

Actions

Soulfreezing Touch. Melee Spell Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2d10 necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 CON saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute.

Master of Necromancy (1/S). This monster casts a spell using a Spell card from your discard pile.

name: Mind Flayer
description:
Magic Resistance. This monster has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Actions

Extract Brain. Melee Spell Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4d10 piercing damage. If the target is stunned, it must make a DC 16 INT saving throw or be instantly destroyed.

Mind Blast (1/S). All enemies within 15 feet must make a DC 16 INT saving throw or take 5d8 psychic damage and be stunned until the end of their next turn.

name: Roc
description:
Keen Sight. This monster has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

Actions

Titanic Talons. Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 3d10 + 6 slashing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they must make a DC 17 STR saving throw or be grappled.

Sonic Screech (1/S). Lets out a deafening screech. All enemies within 30 feet must make a DC 17 CON saving throw or take 5d6 thunder damage and be deafened until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, they take half damage and are not deafened.

Sky's Wrath (1/S). This monster drops a grappled target from the sky. The target falls to the ground and, if it falls at least 30 feet, takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and lands prone.

name: Stone Golem
description:
Immutable Form. This monster is immune to being charmed, paralyzed, or petrified and has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

Stoneform Aura. Allied Construct monsters within 10 feet of this monster gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

Actions

Colossal Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4d10 + 6 bludgeoning damage.

Trample (1/S). Choose one enemy creature within 15 feet of this monster. This monster moves to the target and then makes a Colossal Slam attack. If it hits, the target is knocked prone.

name: Tarrasque
description:
Legendary Resilience. This monster takes half damage from all attacks, except for critical hits.

Actions

Devour. Melee Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 4d12 + 10 piercing damage.

Worldshaker (1/S). This monster stomps the battlefield, forcing all creatures to make a DC 20 STR saving throw or be knocked prone and take 6d10 bludgeoning damage.

name: Treant
description:
Siege Monster. This monster deals double damage to objects and structures.

Rooted Resilience. If this monster does not move on its turn, it gains +2 AC until the start of its next turn.

Actions

Crushing Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3d6 + 6 bludgeoning damage.

Entangling Roots (1/S). Choose one enemy creature within 15 feet of this monster. The target must make a DC 16 STR saving throw or be restrained by the roots until the end of its next turn.

Ancient Guardian (1/S). Allied Plant and Beast monsters within 15 feet of this monster gain resistance to all damage types until the start of its next turn.

name: Acid Arrow
description: Choose a creature within 60 feet and make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 2d4 acid damage immediately and an additional 2d4 acid damage at the start of its next turn.

name: Bane
description: Choose up to three creatures within 30 feet. Each must make a CHA saving throw. On a failure, the target rolls a d4 and subtracts the result from its next two attack rolls or saving throws.

name: Bless
description: Choose up to three creatures within 30 feet. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or saving throw, it may roll a d4 and add the result to the total. A target can only add this bonus once.

name: Blindness/Deafness
description: Choose one creature within 30 feet. It must make a CON saving throw. On a failure, the target is blinded or deafened (your choice) for 1 minute. It may repeat the save at the end of each of its turns to end the effect early.

name: Burning Hands
description: A 15-foot cone of fire erupts from your hands. Each creature in the area must make a DEX saving throw. On a failure, they take 3d6 fire damage. On a success, they take half damage. Flammable objects in the area ignite unless they are being worn or carried.

name: Charm Person
description: Choose one humanoid within 30 feet. It must make a WIS saving throw (with advantage if it is fighting you). On a failure, the target is charmed for 1 hour, considering you a friendly acquaintance. The effect ends if you or your allies harm it.

name: Chromatic Orb
description: Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder. Then, make a ranged spell attack against a creature within 90 feet. On a hit, the target takes 3d8 damage of the chosen type.

name: Cure Wounds
description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on Undead or Construct monsters.

name: Detect Magic
description: For 1 minute, you can sense the presence of magic within 30 feet. You can see a faint aura around any magical creature or object and identify its school of magic.

name: Earth Tremor
description: The ground shakes violently in a 10-foot radius around you. All creatures except you must make a DEX saving throw. On a failure, they take 1d6 bludgeoning damage and are knocked prone.

name: Earthbind
description: Choose one creature within 300 feet. It must make a STR saving throw or have its flying speed reduced to 0 for 1 minute. An affected creature descends safely at 60 feet per round until it reaches the ground.

name: Feather Fall
description: Choose up to five creatures within 60 feet that are falling. Their descent slows to 60 feet per round for 1 minute. If a creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and lands on its feet.

name: Fog Cloud
description: Create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within 120 feet. The area is heavily obscured. The fog dissipates in strong wind or lasts for 1 minute.

name: Grease
description: Cover a 10-foot square within 60 feet in slippery, non-flammable grease for 1 minute. The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures in the area must make a DEX saving throw or fall prone. A creature that enters or ends its turn in the area must also save or fall prone.

name: Heroism
description: Choose one willing creature you can touch. For 1 minute, it is immune to the Frightened condition and gains temporary HP equal to your spellcasting modifier at the start of each of its turns.

name: Hold Person
description: Choose one humanoid within 60 feet. It must make a WIS saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target may repeat the save at the end of each of its turns to end the effect early.

name: Magic Missile
description: Create four magical darts that strike one or multiple creatures within 120 feet. The darts strike simultaneously and can be split among multiple targets. Each dart automatically hits and deals 1d4 + 1 force damage.

name: Mage Armor
description: Touch one willing creature without armor. For 8 hours, its base AC becomes 13 + its DEX modifier. The spell ends if the target puts on armor or if you dismiss it as an action.

name: Shield of Faith
description: Choose one creature within 60 feet. For 10 minutes, it gains +2 AC as a shimmering magical barrier surrounds it.

name: Thorn Whip
description: Make a melee spell attack against a creature within 30 feet. On a hit, it takes 1d6 piercing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is pulled up to 10 feet closer to you.

name: Thunderwave
description: Release a 15-foot cube of thunderous force. All creatures in the area must make a CON saving throw. On a failure, they take 2d8 thunder damage and are pushed 10 feet away. On a success, they take half damage and are not pushed. Unsecured objects in the area are pushed 10 feet, and a thunderous boom is audible within 300 feet.

name: Web
description: Conjure a mass of sticky webs in a 20-foot cube within 60 feet. The area becomes difficult terrain and is lightly obscured for 1 hour. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the area must make a DEX saving throw or be restrained until they escape. A restrained creature can use an action to make a STR (Athletics) check against your spell save DC to break free. The webs are flammable. A 5-foot cube of webs burns in 1 round, dealing 2d4 fire damage to creatures in the area.

name: Banishment
description: Choose one creature within 30 feet. It must make a CHA saving throw or be banished to a harmless demiplane for 1 minute. While banished, the creature is incapacitated and removed from combat. When the spell ends, the target returns to its original space or the nearest unoccupied space.

name: Black Tentacles
description: Summon squirming ebony tentacles in a 20-foot square within 90 feet. The area becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the area must make a DEX saving throw or take 3d6 bludgeoning damage and be restrained. Restrained creatures take 3d6 bludgeoning damage at the start of their turns. A restrained creature can use an action to make a STR (Athletics) check to escape.

name: Cone of Cold
description: Release a blast of freezing air in a 60-foot cone. All creatures in the area must make a CON saving throw. They take 8d8 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. Creatures killed by this spell become frozen statues until they thaw.

name: Fireball
description: A 20-foot-radius explosion erupts at a point within 150 feet. All creatures in the area must make a DEX saving throw. They take 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. Flammable objects ignite unless they are worn or carried.

name: Immolation
description: Choose one creature within 90 feet. It must make a DEX saving throw. The target takes 8d6 fire damage and burns for 1 minute on a failed save, or takes half as much damage and does not burn on a success. While burning, the target sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for another 30 feet. At the end of each of its turns, it repeats the DEX saving throw. On a failure, it takes 4d6 fire damage. On a success, the flames are extinguished. These flames cannot be put out by non-magical means. If this spell kills the target, it is reduced to ash.

name: Insect Plague
description: Summon a 20-foot-radius swarm of locusts within 300 feet. The area lasts 10 minutes, becoming difficult terrain and lightly obscured. When the swarm appears, all creatures in the area must make a CON saving throw. They take 4d10 piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. Any creature that enters or ends its turn in the area must repeat this saving throw.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide lightning blast erupts from you. All creatures in its path must make a DEX saving throw. They take 8d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. Flammable objects ignite unless they are worn or carried.

name: Maelstrom
description: A 30-foot-radius vortex of 5-foot-deep swirling water appears at a point within 120 feet. The area is difficult terrain for 1 minute. Any creature that starts its turn in the area must make a STR saving throw. It takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and is pulled 10 feet toward the center on a failed save.

name: Misty Step
description: Instantly teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

name: Soul Drain
description: Choose one creature within 30 feet. It must make a CON saving throw. It takes 4d8 necrotic damage, and you regain HP equal to half the damage dealt on a failed save, or it takes half as much damage and you regain no HP on a success.

name: Soul Shackles
description: Choose one creature within 30 feet. It must make a WIS saving throw. On a failed save, it is paralyzed for 1 minute and takes 2d6 necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. At the start of each of its turns, it may repeat the WIS save to end the effect early.

name: Speak with Dead
description: Choose a corpse within 10 feet that has a mouth and is not undead. For 10 minutes, you may ask it up to five questions. The corpse only remembers what it knew in life and answers briefly, cryptically, or repetitively. It is not compelled to tell the truth if it recognizes you as an enemy. The corpse cannot learn new information, understand events after its death, or predict the future. This spell fails if the corpse was targeted by this spell in the last 10 days.

name: Stoneskin
description: Touch one willing creature. For 1 hour, it gains resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Choose one creature or object within 150 feet. A lightning bolt arcs towards that target, and three additional bolts arc to up to three different targets within 30 feet of the first. Each target must make a DEX saving throw. Targets take 10d8 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. A bolt cannot target a creature more than once.

name: Invulnerability
description: You become immune to all damage for 1 minute or until the spell ends.

name: Meteor Swarm
description: Summon three blazing meteors, each impacting a 40-foot-radius sphere within 1 mile. Each creature in the area must make a DEX saving throw. On a failed save, they take 6d6 fire damage and 6d6 bludgeoning damage, or half as much on a success. A creature in multiple impact zones is only hit once. Flammable objects ignite, and the spell damages all objects in the area.

name: Oblivion Pulse
description: Unleash a 50-foot-radius shockwave of void energy centered on you. All creatures in range must make a CON saving throw. On a failure, they take 10d8 necrotic damage and cannot regain HP for 3 turns. On a success, they take half damage. If this spell reduces a creature to 0 HP, they are completely erased from existence.

name: Power Word Kill
description: Choose one creature within 60 feet. If it has 100 HP or fewer, it dies instantly. If it has more than 100 HP, the spell has no effect.

name: Prismatic Spray
description:
A 60-foot cone of multicolored rays erupts from your hand. Each creature in the area must make a DEX saving throw. Roll a d8 for each target to determine the effect:

1. Red: 10d6 fire damage.

2. Orange: 10d6 acid damage.

3. Yellow: 10d6 lightning damage.

4. Green: 10d6 poison damage.

5. Blue: 10d6 cold damage.

6. Indigo: The target becomes restrained. It must then make a CON saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If it successfully saves three times, the spell ends. If it fails its save three times, it permanently turns to stone and is subjected to the petrified condition. The successes and failures don't need to be consecutive; keep track of both until the target collects three of a kind.

7. Violet: The target is blinded. It must then make a WIS saving throw at the start of your next turn. A successful save ends the blindness. If it fails that save, the creature is transported to another plane of existence of the GM's choosing and is no longer blinded.

8. Special: The target is struck by 2 rays. Roll twice more, rerolling any 8.

name: Regenerate
description: Touch one creature. It regains 4d8 + 15 HP instantly. For 1 hour, the target regains 1 HP at the start of each of its turns.

name: Tsunami
description: Summon a 50-foot-wide wall of water that crashes through the battlefield in a straight line up to 120 feet long. All creatures in its path must make a STR saving throw. On a failure, they take 8d8 bludgeoning damage and are knocked prone and pushed 20 feet away, or half as much damage on a success and are not pushed. The area remains flooded for 2 turns, making movement difficult terrain.

name: Blood Price
description: Reduce the damage taken by half. Then, deal 1d8 necrotic damage to an enemy within 10 feet.

name: Ferocious Roar
description: The beast lets out a terrifying roar. The attacker must make a DC 12 WIS saving throw or become Frightened until the end of its next turn.
reactionTrigger: A Beast monster under your control takes damage

name: Hellish Rebuke
description: You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by hellish flames. The creature must make a DEX saving throw. It takes 2d10 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
reactionTrigger: You or an ally are damaged by a creature within 60 feet of them that they can see

name: Pit Trap
description: The creature that moved near you falls into a spiked pit trap. The creature must make a DEX saving throw. It takes 2d8 piercing damage and its movement speed is reduced to 0 on a failed save, or half as much damage and no movement speed reduction on a successful one.
reactionTrigger: A creature moves within 10 feet of you or an ally

name: Poison Dart Trap
description: The creature that moved near you succumbs to a volley of poisonous darts. The creature must make a DEX saving throw. It takes 1d4 piercing damage, 1d4 poison damage, and is Poisoned on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one and is not Poisoned.
reactionTrigger: A creature moves within 10 feet of you or an ally

name: Reroll
description: The player that just rolled rerolls a die involved in the roll.

name: Shield
description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects the target. Until the start of your next turn, the target has a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and takes no damage from magic missile.
reactionTrigger: You or an ally is hit by an attack or targeted by magic missiles

name: Counterspell
description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.
reactionTrigger: A creature within 60 feet of you casts a spell

name: Dimensional Blockage
description: The connection is severed and the teleportation fails. The target takes 4d8 force damage.
reactionTrigger: A creature teleports or moves between planes

name: Lightning Reflexes
description: The target of this reaction automatically succeeds on the DEX saving throw. This card can only target one creature, and must be activated before the DEX saving throw is rolled.
reactionTrigger: You or an ally are forced to make a DEX saving throw

name: Necromancer's Gravecall
description: The words of the Necromancer flow through you and command your servant to continue its fight. The creature that was just killed is revived. If the creature is of SR rarity, then it is revived with half of its maximum HP.
reactionTrigger: An SR rarity or lower Undead monster on the field under your control is killed

name: Redirect
description: Your mastery over the arcane lets you alter the course of spells targeted at you. If the spell is of 5th level or lower you alter its course and can send it back to the initial caster as if it were your own spell; having to make a spell attack roll or the initial caster now making the saving throw. If the spell if of 6th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability with a DC equal to 10 + the spell's level. On a success, you alter the spell's course. On a failure, the spell maintains its original course towards affecting you.
reactionTrigger: You or an ally is hit by a ranged attack or spell

name: Siphon Life
description: You siphon the life of your own wicked servants, unsatisfied with their performance. The monster that was just attacked receives 1d8 necrotic damage and you draw a card.
reactionTrigger: A monster on the field under your control is hit by an attack

name: Twisted Fate
description: The target of this reaction must reroll the saving throw.
reactionTrigger: A creature succeeds on a saving throw

name: Demonic Contract
description: Your contract with the demons of the underworld must be carried out. Instead of dying, you revive with 1 HP. At the start of your next turn, you take 3d10 necrotic damage.

name: Phoenix Rebirth
description: The creature is engulfed in flames, only to rise again, reborn from the ashes. Instead of being killed, it is restored to half of its maximum HP. Additionally, at the start of its next turn, it deals 3d6 fire damage to all enemies within 10 feet.
reactionTrigger: The HP of a creature within 30 feet of you reduces to 0

name: Arcane Recharge
description: Shuffle up to 3 Spell cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Bardic Inspiration
description: All monsters on the field under your control add 1d4 to their next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

name: Call of the Beast
description: Search your deck for a Beast monster card and add it your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can only play this card if you have a Beast monster on the field.

name: Cunning Action
description: Choose one of your monsters on the field. During this turn, that monster may take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

name: Eye of the Void
description: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Discard one and put the other cards back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Law of Equivalent Exchange
description: Discard a card from your hand. Then, draw 1 card from your deck.

name: Lucky Coin Flip
description: Flip a coin. If heads, draw one card. If tails, restore 5 HP.

name: Monster Sacrifice
description: Discard a Monster card from your hand. Then, search your deck for a Monster card with the same Rarity as the one you discarded and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Odd Medicine
description: Heal 1d8 damage and a condition from one of your summoned monsters. This card has no effect on Undead or Construct monsters.

name: Quick Feet
description: Choose one of your monsters on the field. Its movement speed increases by 10 feet until the end of the turn.

name: Reckless Attack
description: Choose one of your monsters on the field. Until your next turn, that monster has advantage on melee attack rolls, but attack rolls against it have advantage.

name: Wild Shape
description: Replace one of your Beast monsters on the field with a Beast monster of the same rarity in your hand. The new monster cannot take an action until your next turn.

name: Cursed Pact
description: Choose one of your monsters on the field. It gains +4 to attack rolls but takes 1d6 necrotic damage at the start of each of your turns.

name: Dark Harvest
description: Draw a card for each Undead monster you control.

name: Final Will & Testament
description: Draw 2 cards. You can only play this card if one of your monsters died on the field last turn.

name: Fortune Teller
description: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put a card you find there into your hand. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.

name: Gambler
description: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Roll a d20. If you rolled higher than a 10, draw 6 cards. If you rolled a 10 or lower, draw 1 card.

name: Greedy Looting
description: Draw 2 cards from your deck.

name: Luminous Crystal
description: Look at the bottom 3 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand, and put the remaining two on top of your deck in any order.

name: Magic Librarian
description: Draw a card for each Spell card in your hand.

name: Mental Reset
description: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw the same amount of cards that you had in your hand.

name: Mouth of the Beholder
description: This card is required for the activation of “Eye of the Beholder”. When that card is activated, discard this card. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck.

name: Orb of Dragonkind
description:
Choose 1:
  • Choose one of your Dragon monsters on the field. That monster gains an extra action during this turn.
  • Search your deck for a Dragon monster card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Reanimate
description: Discard a card from your hand. Search your discard pile for any Monster card and put it in your hand.

name: Repairs
description: Choose one of your Construct Monsters on the field and heal 3d8 damage from it.

name: Rewind the Clock
description: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

name: Summon Greater Undead
description: Choose one Undead monster from your discard pile and summon it to the field. If it is of SR rarity or lower, it returns with full HP. If it is SSR rarity, it returns with half HP.

name: Tentacles of the Beholder
description: This card is required for the activation of “Eye of the Beholder”. When that card is activated, discard this card. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck.

name: Traveling Merchant
description: Search your deck for 2 “R” rarity Utility cards or 1 “SR” rarity Utility card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Action Surge
description: You may take an additional action during this turn.

name: Cursed Battlefield
description: Until the end of the battle, all healing effects are halved, and all necrotic damage is doubled.

name: Eye of the Beholder
description: If you play this card without “Tentacles of the Beholder” and “Mouth of the Beholder” in your hand, this card does nothing. Make an attack that deals 12d10 true damage to a target creature.

name: Mind's Eye
description: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Sanguine Revelation
description: You take as much damage as you want. For every 10 damage you just took, draw a card.

name: The Ace Up Your Sleeve
description:
Choose 1:
  • Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put 2 of them into your hand, and shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.
  • When a monster on the field under your control deals damage during this turn, the attack deals an extra 6d6 damage.
  • Search your deck for a Monster or Spell card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
